column5: So i had this brilliant idea, Buy a Jon Boat and throw on a 30lb thrust trolling motor a fish finder all with keeping it under $1000.00 So my question to the community, I know gas powered motors are not allowed in Duffins Creek how about a clean electric driven trolling motor? Last week i was in a row boat and was fishing with a friend and wow the back bays actually produce decent fish such as Pike and Bass we seen Carp as well.
There would be no laws on electric motors.
